home.title: Share Lists with Anyone
home.subtitle: Create collaborative lists, invite friends and family, and keep everyone in sync. Perfect for reading lists, shopping, travel planning, and more.
home.feature1Desc: Create lists and share them with friends, family, or colleagues via email invites.
home.feature2Desc: Control who can view, edit, or manage your lists with Owner, Editor, and Viewer roles.
home.feature3Desc: Search millions of books and add them to your reading lists with cover images and author info.
home.step1Desc: Start by creating a new list for any purpose - reading goals, shopping, travel plans, or anything else.
home.step2Desc: Share your list by inviting others via email. Choose their role: Editor to collaborate or Viewer to just see.
home.step3Desc: Everyone sees real-time updates. Mark items as done, add notes, and keep everyone on the same page.
home.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of users who trust GetConnect for their shared lists.
